mapper.select: SELECT t.*, c.customer_name as customerName, e.actual_name as managerName FROM t_measurement t left join t_customer c on t.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON t.manager_id = e.employee_id where t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_measurement set deleted_flag = #{deletedFlag} where id = #{id}
